ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Murphy Anderson,Nick Cardy,Jerry Grandenetti,Jack Sparling,José Delbo
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rob Richards makes a wish that he not age.
Two soldiers meet in the ruins of a city. They fight and kill each other. A third man finds their bodies and wonders what could have been so important that they would kill each other.
Chou Hung fails to keep the tomb of his ancestors clean.
Elliott and Ramsay search for the lost city of Athai and end up destroying the world.
ComicInfo.Title: The Lonely Road Home!; The Last Straw; Trumpet Perilous!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
